mapper.select: SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T3.CST_KNM --고객명 , T1.SELL_TP_CD --판매유형 , T4.PD_NM --상품명 , T4.PD_CD --상품코드 FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 --계약상세 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 -- 계약기본 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T3 --고객기본 ON T3.CST_NO = T2.CNTR_CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T4 --상품기본 ON T4.PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.SELL_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
